title: Adding meaningless prefixes with the name of Allah when naming children - Assim al hakeem
transcript: a la la la and I don't know what other laughs most probably the name is Abdullah and this was a miss spelled name a lot of the people by the way and this is before going to the question of let's say Abdullah a lot of the people put prefixes to the name of Allah that do not make sense and they call the children anything as long as they attach the name of Allah to it and this is wrong you want to call your son something use the prefix of AB the slave off so you say Abdullah there's no problem in that but to put other prefixes sometimes meaningless prefixes this is not permissible
